results.title: Well, if you ask me
results.creator_credit: Victorian Film Corporation and Seven Dimensions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Working together”.
Discussion starter looking at the difficulties of eliciting opinions from within a group. Two executives are clear in their objections to the location of a new plant. However, once inside the boardroom they say nothing and the proposal is passed without objection. Suitable for upper secondary level.
results.description:

results.title: Briefing
results.creator_credit: Victorian Film Corporation and Seven Dimensions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Working together”.
Discussion starter looking at the problem of an individual receiving information from a group. Three executives are briefing a new designer and digress to such an extent that at the end of the briefing the designer still has to ask what the product was. Suitable for upper secondary level.
results.description:

results.title: The Decision makers
results.creator_credit: Victorian Film Corporation and Seven Dimensions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Working together”.
Looks at the problem of small group decision-making. An inadequately briefed syndicate group wastes time deciding what it is supposed to be discussing. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.

results.title: Jesus of Nazareth
results.creator_credit: Franco Zeffirelli, Vincenzo Labella and Don Bosco Multimedia
results.brief_description: This is a special catechetical edition of Zeffirelli’s film, divided into 14 distinct parts, running for a total time of 7 hours. Starring Robert Powell as Jesus Christ, Peter Ustinov as Herod, Olivia Hussey as the Virgin Mary, Michael York as John the Baptist, Anne Bancroft as Mary Magdelene, and James Farentino as the Apostle Peter, this is the tale of the life and death of Jesus Christ, from the time of his birth until his crucifixion.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Franco Zeffirelli, Vincenzo Labella and Don Bosco Multimedia
results.description: This is a special catechetical edition of Zeffirelli’s film, divided into 14 distinct parts, running for a total time of 7 hours. results.title: The Risen Lord living forever
results.creator_credit: Franco Zeffirelli, Vincenzo Labella and Don Bosco Multimedia
results.brief_description:
Episode number 14 of Series “Jesus of Nazareth”.
The continuing story of the life of Jesus Christ from: Zerah asks the Romans to put a special watch on the tonb of Jesus; Mary Magdalene and the women go to the tomb and find it is empty; the fearful Apostles gather in the cenacle; Mary Magdalene announces to them that she has seen the risen Christ; Peter rallies the disciples; Jesus returns to his diciples, comforts them and sends them out to the whole world.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Franco Zeffirelli, Vincenzo Labella and Don Bosco Multimedia

results.title: The Son of God crucified
results.creator_credit: Franco Zeffirelli, Vincenzo Labella and Don Bosco Multimedia
results.brief_description:
Episode number 13 of Series “Jesus of Nazareth”.
The continuing story of the life of Jesus Christ from: Pilate allows the crowds to choose between Jesus and Barrabas, the crowd chooses Barrabas; Jesus leaves the Praetorium carrying the cross; He is led through the streets of Jerusalem; Jesus sees Nicodemus and is met by the pious woman; on Calvary Jesus is nailed and hung on a cross between two thieves; The Centurion allows Mary and the women to stand at the foot of the cross; Jesus talks to his mother and John; Jesus dies on the cross and is taken down.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Franco Zeffirelli, Vincenzo Labella and Don Bosco Multimedia

results.title: The Innocent condemned
results.creator_credit: Franco Zeffirelli, Vincenzo Labella and Don Bosco Multimedia
results.brief_description:
Episode number 12 of Series “Jesus of Nazareth”.
The continuing story of the life of Jesus Christ from: in the garden of Gethsemane, Jesus talks to the Father; Judas betrays Jesus with a kiss; Jesus is arrested and taken away; Judas is given his money by Zerah; Jesus is taken before the high priest and questioned; Caiaphas is outraged by his answers; Peter denies Jesus three times; Judas is found hanged; Jesus is questioned by Pontius Pilate; Jesus is whipped by the soldiers; Jesus is mocked and crowned with thorns.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Franco Zeffirelli, Vincenzo Labella and Don Bosco Multimedia

results.title: Bread of eternal life
results.creator_credit: Franco Zeffirelli, Vincenzo Labella and Don Bosco Multimedia
results.brief_description:
Episode number 11 of Series “Jesus of Nazareth”.
The continuing story of the life of Jesus Christ from: in the temple of Sanhedrin; Joseph of Arimathea, Nicodemus and Caiaphas; Judas visits with Zerah in his quarters in the temple; the last supper; Jesus breaks bread with his disciples and gives them the commandment of love; Jesus predicts he will be betrayed by Judas.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Franco Zeffirelli, Vincenzo Labella and Don Bosco Multimedia
